Package index

All functions

add_atmo_dep()
Update SWAT+ project with atmospheric deposition data
add_weather()
Update SWAT+ SQLite database with weather data
clean_outliers()
Clean outliers outside specified standard deviations
clean_wq()
Clean water quality data from common issues
extract_rotation()
Extract rotation information from raster file
find_dif()
Find Differences Between Files in Two Setups
get_atmo_dep()
Extract EMEP atmospheric deposition data for a catchment
get_lu_points()
Prepare training points for remote sensing algorithm
get_usersoil_table()
Prepare user soil table for SWAT model
interpolate()
Interpolate Weather Data
load_netcdf_weather()
Extract Climate Data from CORDEX NetCDF into Nested List
load_swat_weather()
Load SWAT+ weather text files into R
load_template()
Load Data Templates
plot_cal_data()
Plot Calibration Data
plot_fractions()
Plot Regression and Fractions for Each Month
plot_map()
Prepare Interactive Map of Monitoring Points
plot_monthly()
Aggregating values of single station to interactive monthly box plots
plot_weather()
Prepare Plotly Figure for Weather Data
plot_weather_compare()
Plotting Figure to Compare Two Datasets with Weather Data
plot_wgn_comparison()
Plot WGN Parameters Comparison
prepare_climate()
Prepare or Update Climate Data Text Input Files in SWAT+ Model
prepare_ps()
Prepare Point Source Data Model Text Files
prepare_wgn()
Generate Weather Generator (WGN) Data for SWAT+ Model
setup_info()
Read information about model setup from SWAT files
sol_to_usersoil()
Convert SWAT+ soils.sol data to usersoil format
usersoil_to_sol()
Convert 'usersoil.csv' to 'soils.sol'
wbalance_table()
Prepare water balance table
